pageContext.claim: “Now, [Biden is] saying, 'He should've acted faster,' except, when I did the ban on China, he said I shouldn't do it for two and a half months, then he admitted he was wrong too.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden wrote an opinion article that was published in USA Today on Jan. 27, titled “Trump is worst possible leader to deal with coronavirus outbreak.” The op-ed appeared only days after the Chinese government shut down the city of Wuhan in an effort to stem the crisis, so Biden focused early on an issue that for most Americans was still a distant threat.
